name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Beijing, a netizen named "PZ气静心平" has been posting posts for several days, saying that her husband worked for Xiaomi Auto. As Xiaomi has been laying off employees, her husband even had to take over the work of seven or eight people and was responsible for more than 100 stores at the same time. There were hundreds of work groups on his mobile phone. He worked overtime until the early morning every day before going home. Eventually, her husband was exhausted to death at the age of 34. Afterwards, these work groups kicked her husband out of the group. Xiaomi has not yet responded to this matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 4, blogger Liu Daopu posted a video saying that the United Nations recently passed the "Future Compact" document, but Russia requested that a clause "not to interfere in the internal affairs of other countries under any circumstances" be added to the document. The blogger believes that Russia's intention is "I will not interfere in your internal affairs, and you don't care what I do in Russia, even if it is something bad, you outsiders cannot interfere." The blogger said, "If you are civilized and you respect human rights, then what are you afraid of?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 6, Jinan. Following the street bombing in front of the Zhangqiu District Government last month, a large number of local "spirited young men" gathered in Kuanhouli to bomb the streets. Some people jumped onto the bus stop to dance, and some people set off fireworks in the crowd.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @PoplarDesert 👍

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As of October 5, the Chinese government has organized two batches of 215 Chinese citizens to be safely evacuated from Lebanon by ship and charter flight, including three Hong Kong residents and one Taiwan compatriot. Among them, Ms. Lin, a Hong Kong resident, sent a letter of thanks to the Central People's Government, the Chinese Embassy in Lebanon, the Hong Kong Immigration Department, the Hong Kong Office in Beijing, Air China, and CCTV. In the letter, she said: Thank you to the Central People's Government for caring for overseas compatriots. At the time when the war was raging in Lebanon, it overcame all difficulties, opened up various channels, and took us home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At noon on October 6, in Ge Village, Qinyang City, Jiaozuo City, Henan Province, a vehicle crashed into a roadside restaurant, injuring many people. It was reported online that the cause of the accident was the driver's drunk driving. A total of 9 people were injured, and there is no police report yet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: September 5, Shanghai. An old stock investor with the online name "Shanghai Uncle" said that after the National Day holiday, the Chinese stock market will continue to rise to near the daily limit, and the Shanghai Composite Index will reach 3489 points by the end of the month. He also said that it is a great buy and a glorious trade now, and the ChiNext and Science and Technology Innovation Board will soar next year, and he will take CITIC Securities on the most luxurious cruise ship in the motherland.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 1, during the flag-raising ceremony at Tiananmen Square in Beijing, a Russian girl with a standard Henan accent, "Henan Little Nerlisa", burst into tears due to excitement. The girl, who has been in China for 17 years, said that she felt a sense of belonging at this moment, as if she was Chinese in her previous life.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Coincidentally, on September 30, New Jersey federal prosecutor Salinger and federal multi-agency law enforcement officers jointly announced that a local Chinese young man was formally sentenced to 64 months in prison for providing material support to Hamas.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Jinan also has its own Florida. On October 5 and 6, in Jinan, Shandong, the will-o'-the-wisp teenagers gathered at Jiefang Pavilion, racing cars, setting off fireworks, and clashing with the police and security guards who were maintaining order, attracting a large number of citizens to watch.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/0nDlGiz7Jh

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At the beginning of the school year, a large number of newly enrolled college students encountered part-time training scams. The institutions took advantage of the new students' desire to earn a living and recommended students to purchase PS and editing courses ranging in price from 2,000 to 6,000 yuan, tricking students into signing contracts, and then asking students to turn on automatic payment, with money regularly deducted from bank cards, Alipay or WeChat. Students who participate in the training can take orders after passing the assessment. The institutions claim that they can quickly get their money back, and the more they work, the more they earn. However, few students can pass the assessment, and after passing the assessment, there are few part-time opportunities, and they cannot get their money back even if they continue to work part-time. To avoid disputes, these companies register in large numbers every year and then suddenly cancel their registrations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A netizen submitted an article saying that he was recently defrauded of up to 5,000 yuan in part-time training fees. This was not the first time. The last time he was defrauded, he told his parents and was scolded badly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, "Dongdong Anan" is no longer visible on Douyin and Xiaohongshu.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking news! In the early morning of October 7, a convoy of Chinese investors and engineers was hit by an explosion while traveling near Karachi International Airport in Pakistan.
The Balochistan Liberation Army issued a statement and released a photo of the attacker, claiming responsibility for the attack.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the suicide attack at Karachi Airport in Pakistan has killed at least 2 people and injured 10. Some media reported that the dead were two Chinese engineers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In order to protect the image of their idol, fans forged a post on People's Daily Online. Recently, actor Xin Yuxi revealed that Qin Xiaoxian of Deyun Club had cheated on her many times. The incident has been on the hot search list many times and gradually fermented. On October 3, Qin Xiaoxian's fans forged the People's Daily Online website and posted an article titled "Vulgar hype to attract attention, the culture of exposing "melons" is not desirable" on the forged website. Some netizens mistakenly interpreted it as "People's Daily accuses Xin Yuxi of vulgar revelations" and "secretly supports Qin Xiaoxian". However, People's Daily Online commented that People's Daily did not publish this article, which was a complete "copycat" trick. Tongzhou police issued a notice saying that they have filed a case for investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 6, netizens submitted an article. The Bayi Campus of Zhengzhou Middle School in Zhengzhou High-tech Zone, Henan Province, adopts military management. Students are required to get up at 6 a.m. and finish evening self-study at 9 p.m. upon enrollment. The dormitory environment is very bad. The evening self-study for grade 9 is delayed to 9:30 p.m., and the free time in the afternoon is cancelled. The school also illegally divides and splits classes into experimental classes. One of the split classes is the director of moral education and the head teacher. Because the head teacher did not want to be the head teacher, he took advantage of his position to disband the class regardless of the feelings of more than 40 students. Parents and students questioned him, but he avoided the important issues and did not give a direct answer, and he also interviewed the students. Students from the disbanded class were extremely uncomfortable in the new class and suffered discrimination. One student who cut his wrists was diagnosed with depression. The new head teacher also had low morals, discriminated against the transferred students, made personal attacks, and said that those students were robbing oxygen from his original students. Before National Day, the school leaders also discussed a decision to deduct students' statutory holidays, and only Sundays...
fullContent: 10月6日，网友投稿。河南郑州高新区郑州中学八一校区采取军事化管理，刚入学就要求早上六点起床，晚上九点下晚自习，宿舍环境很恶劣，九年级晚自习延迟到了九点半，并且取消下午的自由活动时间。学校还违法分班拆班划分实验班，拆开的班级里有一个是德育主任兼班主任。该班主任因为自己不想做班主任，就借职务之便不顾四十多个同学感受解散班级。家长学生质问他，他避重就轻也不正面回答还要约谈学生。被解散班级的学生去了新班级后极不适应，饱受歧视，还有一个割腕的被确诊抑郁了，新班主任师德也很低，歧视转过来的学生，搞人身攻击，还说那些学生活着和他原来的学生抢氧气。国庆前校领导还商讨了一个决定，克扣学生的法定节假日，星期天只放一天，周日下午两点半就要返校。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 6, netizens discovered that Taobao's review had listed the Blue Sky, White Sun and Red Earth flag as an illegal image, and words such as "all over the ground red" and "the other side" were sensitive words. They could be sent out but the other party would not be able to see them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 2, the Financial Times published an article titled "China's Challenge Has Not United Americans". The current relationship between China and the United States is too complicated for the two sides to draw a clear line. It is impossible for the United States to engage in a "cold war" with its main supplier of imported goods and the second largest holder of public debt.
